front.title: •••Rebel Scout
front.gametext: May move as a 'react' (for free) to a battle where you have a Rebel of ability > 2 or a leader.
front.lore: A Rebel Scout such as Vidar Blin is usually assigned to recon missions. Trained in first-response tactics, many come to the Alliance with prior special forces experience.

pulledBy: Pucumir Thryss (to same Cloud City site)
